pageProduct.name: Swisse Ultivite Multivitamin Effervescent 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultivite Effervescent is a premium quality, great tasting formula containing a combination of vitamins and minerals to help fill nutritional gaps, support energy production and assist with healthy mental performance. 

Energy Production: Contains a high strength dose of B group vitamins to support energy production and vitality. Vitamin B2, B6 and B12 contribute to a reduction in tiredness and fatigue. 

Healthy Mental Performance: Contains

vitamin B5, which helps support healthy mental performance.

Support During Stress: The body may have an increased need for B group vitamins during periods of nervous tension and stress. Vitamin B5 and B6 are important for adrenals. Healthy adrenal function helps support the body’s response to stress. 

Antioxidant Support: Contains vitamin C, which provides antioxidant support to help protect cells against free radical damage. Swisse Ulitivite effervescent has been formulated based on scientific evidence to provide a multivitamin in a convenient, one-a-day dose. This orange flavoured formula is an alternative for those who have difficulty swallowing large tablets or capsules.

 

Lifestyle Claim: Vegetarian

Size: 60 Tablets

Warnings

Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet. If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare practitioner. The recommended daily dose of this medicine contains 288 mg of sodium.

Ingredients

Contains: EACH TABLET CONTAINS: Vitamin C (as ascorbic acid) 500 mg; Vitamin B1 (thiamine from thiamine nitrate 30.85 mg) 25 mg; Vitamin B2 (riboflavin from riboflavin sodium phosphate 34.2 mg) 25 mg; Nicotinamide 70 mg; Vitamin B5 (pantothenic acid from calcium pantothenate 27.18 mg) 25 mg; Vitamin B6 (pyridoxine from pyridoxine hydrochloride 30.33 mg) 25 mg; Vitamin B12 (cyancobalamin) 25 mcg; Folic acid 500 mcg; Biotin 50 mcg; Calcium (from calcium carbonate 244 mg) 97.6 mg; Magnesium (from magnesium carbonate hydrate 195 mg) 50 mg; Zinc (from zinc citrate trihydrate 16.13 mg) 5 mg.

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Egg| Lactose| Soy| Yeast

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:

One tablet daily, dissolved in water, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a dry place. Always replace cap.

Storage Temperature: below 25°C
